column4: ï»¿hey all, i have a dell inspiron e1505 laptop and running hardy.  i am only getting audio output from one side. it doesn't matter what output i use. any suggestions?
you're sure that both speakers work, have you already tried a headphone ?
thats the thing, no matter what i use i only get audio from the left side.
have you already tried switching between mono and stereo in alsamixer ?
how would i do that i don't think im aware of how one would switch that
give me 2 min. I'll check it
if you open alsamixer (you know, open a terminal and typ alsamixer) go to the right and there you find an option "mono", press M to make it active and then check
also, the gentoo wiki is not a reference for ubuntu
are you on the mono option or on another one ?
that's very very strange, I need to check some stuff to give you an answer, give me 5 min. okey ?
you can toggle a channel with , and . or with < and >
great, now sorry that it had to be done in such an unfriendly way, ubuntu is all about an easy user-experience so we try to minimise the need for this "command line" stuff
well, I was too, I just did man alsamixer and it was in there somewhere ;) :p
